name: Shoulder Rolls
description: Roll your shoulders backwards in a circular motion, 10 repetitions.
illustration: Sit up straight. Lift shoulders up toward ears, roll them back and down in a smooth circular motion. Complete 10 full circles.

name: Neck Stretch (Left)
description: Gently tilt your head to the left, hold for 15 seconds.
illustration: Sit tall with shoulders relaxed. Slowly tilt head toward left shoulder until you feel a gentle stretch on the right side of neck. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Neck Stretch (Right)
description: Gently tilt your head to the right, hold for 15 seconds.
illustration: Sit tall with shoulders relaxed. Slowly tilt head toward right shoulder until you feel a gentle stretch on the left side of neck. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Standing Spine Extension
description: Stand and gently arch your back, hands on lower back for support.
illustration: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Place hands on lower back. Gently arch backwards, looking up toward the ceiling. Hold for 10 seconds, repeat 3 times.

name: Chest Opener Stretch
description: Clasp hands behind your back and lift, opening your chest.
illustration: Stand or sit tall. Clasp hands behind your back with arms straight. Gently lift hands up and away from body while squeezing shoulder blades together. Hold for 15-20 seconds.

name: Seated Spinal Twist
description: Twist your torso gently to each side while seated.
illustration: Sit tall in your chair. Place right hand on left knee, left hand behind you. Gently twist left, hold 15 seconds. Repeat on right side.
